DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety efficacy Lichtenstein 's hernioplasty use Surgisis ES soft tissue graft , mesh , compare traditional Lichtenstein procedure perform polypropylene mesh .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Randomized Trial Comparing Lichtenstein 's Repair Inguinal Hernia With Polypropylene Mesh Versus Surgisis
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion Exclusion Criteria Inclusion criterion : - Male , adult patient - ASA I-III patient - Non-complicated primary inguinal hernia ( classification accord Gilbert I-II-III-IV-V-VI , modify . accord Rutkow Robbins ) perform non-emergency setting repair Lichtenstein 's hernioplasty use polypropylene Surgisis mesh - Informed consent Exclusion criterion - Recurrent hernia - Any condition prevent correct evaluation pain ( non-cooperative patient , blind patient , drug addict ) - Hypersensitivity drug study - Patients intra-operative finding different pathology exclude study Outcomes : General objectives study : 1. determine safety Lichtenstein 's hernioplasty Surgisis ES note complication observe intraoperatively postoperatively 2. determine efficacy Lichtenstein 's hernioplasty Surgisis ES comparison traditional method polypropylene mesh note grade postoperative pain , discomfort , quality life , rate wound infection complication , recurrence rate . The specific objective study : 1. measure degree post-hernioplasty acute chronic pain visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , simple verbal scale ( SVS ) parenteral/oral analgesic consumption two group . 2. measure degree postoperative acute chronic discomfort visual analogue scale ( VAS ) simple verbal scale ( SVS ) . 3. measure postoperative health general status quality life Short Form 36 ( SF-36 ) questionnaire . 4. rate wound infection risk . 5. monitor postoperative complication observe immediate , mid-term long-term postoperative period . 6. measure recurrence rate .
